references.paper_title: Semantic scene completion from a single depth image
references.reason: This paper is foundational for semantic scene completion, introducing the task and a benchmark approach.

references.paper_title: Semantic scene completion using local deep implicit functions on lidar data
references.reason: This paper significantly advances SSC using LiDAR data and local implicit functions, improving accuracy and efficiency.

references.paper_title: SCPNet: Semantic scene completion on point cloud
references.reason: This work proposes a state-of-the-art method for SSC on point clouds, achieving improved performance on standard benchmarks.
This paper introduces a lightweight and efficient model for SSC, suitable for resource-constrained environments.

references.paper_title: Sparse single sweep lidar point cloud segmentation via learning contextual shape priors from scene completion
references.reason: This paper presents a novel approach that effectively combines semantic segmentation and scene completion for improved accuracy.
